SendMail.Subject: Durag move and rename file
SendMail.Body: Move and rename files for the Durag application.

Settings.ScriptName: Name of the script, used in the log files and in the event logs

SendMail.To: An array of email addresses. The script will send an email to all addresses in the array.
SendMail.When: Value 'OnError' : Send email only when a system error or an action error occurs. Value 'OnErrorOrAction' : Send email when the script performed actions or when errors occurred. Value 'Always' : Send email when the script is finished, regardless of success or failure. Value 'Never' : Do not send email.

What.SystemErrors: Value TRUE : Log execution errors, incorrect input file errors, ... Value FALSE : Do not log errors.
What.AllActions: Value TRUE : Log all actions. Value FALSE : Do not log actions, not even on action errors.
What.OnlyActionErrors: Value TRUE : Log only actions that failed. Value FALSE : Do not log failed actions. Ignore the value when AllActions is TRUE.

Where.Folder: Value '..\Logs' : Path relative to the script. Value 'C:\MyApp\Logs' : An absolute path. Value NULL : Create no log file.
Where.FileExtensions: Value ['.xlsx'] : Create an Excel log file. To create Excel log files the module 'ImportExcel' must be installed (`Install-Module -Name ImportExcel`). Value ['.txt'] : Create a text log file. Value ['.csv'] : Create a comma separated log file. Multiple values are supported. The FileExtension is ignored when LogFolder is NULL.
Where.EventLog: Value TRUE : Log verbose to event log. Value FALSE : Do not log messages to the event log.
